headline: Teradata Included in Gartner Peer Insights™ Voice of the Customer for Data Science and Machine Learning Platforms
summary: Teradata (NYSE: TDC) announced its inclusion in the 2025 Gartner Peer Insights™ Voice of the Customer for Data Science and Machine Learning (DSML) Platforms. This recognition highlights direct feedback from verified customers on their real-world experience with Teradata's DSML capabilities and platform performance.
